She used that same defense against Pikachu which nullified its Electric attacks. It`s Iron Tail also couldn`t hit it so high in the air. Ash then noticed the rings in the air and Pikachu jumped up on them and managed to hit Skyla`s Swanna but not directly. Pikachu was now up in the air though and Skyla`s Swanna had the advantage there and it quickly knocked Pikachu out with a powerful Brave Bird attack. Battle Against Trip`s Serperior at the Isshu League Pikachu participated in the Isshu League in the preliminary match where it is was matched up against Trip`s Serperior. Cilan noted that Trip`s Serperior speed and its attack power had leveled up quite a bit too since the last time they saw it. The match was pretty one sided for a long time as Pikachu wasn`t able to counter its speed and ended up getting wrapped up. After using Iron Tail on the ground to get loose, Pikachu used a combination attack of Iron Tail and Electro Ball to one hit KO Trip`s Serperior. As a result, Trip was eliminated from the Isshu League and Ash advanced to the next round.

character.name: Kasumi
character.description: Misty is the Gym Leader of Cerulean City Gym. Ash first met her when she pulled him out of the lake while fishing. He took her bike and head off towards the nearest Pokemon Center to help Pikachu. Pikachu later fried her bike and she got mad and wanted Ash to replace it. Misty has always had a bit of a crush on Ash and it was one of the reasons she decided to travel with him. After traveling with Ash through Kanto, the Orange Islands and the Johto regions, Misty returned to her position as the Cerulean City Gym Leader while her sisters went on a trip around the world. Misty is a devote Water Pokémon trainer and she specializes in Water-type Pokémon. On the other hand, Misty completely despises Bug-type Pokémon and avoids them whenever possible.

character.name: Takeshi
character.description: Brock was the Gym Leader of the Pewter Gym but during his travels abroad, his family has taken over the gym in his absence. Brock goal is to become a Pokémon Breeder and learn as much about Pokémon as he possibly can. Brock was impressed with Ash during their first encounter when Ash challenged him to a Gym Battle. Brock decided to journey with Ash and together they have explored many regions. Brock is also known for his obsession with girls. Almost every girl Brock sees, he immediately falls in love with. Misty, Max and most recently his Pokémon Croagunk have always been there to keep him in check before scaring off the girls with his overbearing introductions. He is also an expert on Nurse Joy and Officer Jenny as he recognizes all the differences in their personalities and features where as other people cannot tell the difference.

character.name: Junsaa
character.description: She is part of a family of policewomen found in almost every town. All of her sisters are named the same, and look identical. They are responsible for enforcing the law, and are often called on when Team Rocket is causing trouble. They typically use Growlithe as an attacking Pokemon. They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various officers apart. The Officer Jennys that are apart of the Orange Islands Police Force have lighter uniforms than those of the Kanto Region.

character.name: Waninoko (Satoshi)
character.description: Totodile first appeared while Ash and Misty were fishing. Both tried to capture it but it hid in the bushes.

character.name: Foretos (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock caught Forretress as a Pineco near Azalea Town with one of Kurt`s Fast Balls while trying to pick Apricorns.

character.name: Sunnygo (Kasumi)
character.description: Misty caught Corsola with the Lure Ball she got from Kurt.

character.name: Haruka
character.description: Haruka is a Pokemon Coordinator from Petalburg City. Starting off her journey, Haruka did not like Pokemon very much. She originally wanted to be a Pokemon Trainer so she could travel and see the world. On the day she got her starter Pokemon, http://anidb.net/ch23625 [Achamo], Haruka met Satoshi and like Kasumi was impressed by Satoshi`s personality. She traveled with Satoshi, her brother Masato and Takeshi until she decided to part ways an compete in the Johto region. Having decided to focus on being a Pokemon Coordinator instead of a Pokemon Trainer, Haruka experience great success during the many Contests she entered. She has competed in the Kanto and Houen Grand Festivals as well as the Wallace Cup where she reached the finals only to loose to Hikari. Haruka is also popular with the fanboys for her well endowed feminine body features. She isn`t shy about showing off her body as well by posing in her various swimming attire.

character.name: Masato
character.description: Masato is the younger sibling of http://anidb.net/ch23585 [Haruka]. He lives in Petalburg City with his family. He traveled with Satoshi, Takeshi and his sister Haruka throughout Houen and Kanto. He returned home after his sister went to Johto and Satoshi and Takeshi went to Sinnoh. Masato knows a lot about Pokemon even though he is quite young. He tries to learn as much about Pokemon as he can so that when he turns 10, he will be prepared to start his own journey to become a great Pokemon Trainer. Since Kasumi was no longer traveling with Takeshi and Satoshi, Masato took up the role of dragging Takeshi away from the girls by the ear.

character.name: Juptile (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Grovyle evolved during a battle against Guy`s Loudred.

character.name: Ohsubame (Satoshi)
character.description: Taillow evolved into Swellow in the final round of the Crossgate Town`s annual PokéRinger Tournament.

character.name: Cotoise (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Torkoal were traveling through the Valley of Steel when they saw Torkoal being attacked.

character.name: Mizugorou (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Mudkip lived in a preserve run by Old Man Swamp. Brock first met the Mudkip after they both helped rescue a baby Mudkip on the preserve. Later another baby Mudkip fell off the cliff and Brock`s Mudkip managed to rescue it but was caught on a rock. It`s trust in Brock increased after Brock rescued it from the waterfall and also when they worked together to fed off Team Rocket. After rescuing the baby Mudkips from Team Rocket, Old Man Swamp noticed how well the older Mudkip got along with Brock and he suggested that it should journey with Brock.

character.name: Hasubrero (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Lombre evolved right after Brock rescued it from a well.

character.name: Agehunt (Haruka)
character.description: May`s Silcoon evolved into Beautifly.

character.name: Eneco (Haruka)
character.description: Skitty had wandered in the desert and it lost its sense of smell. Brock suggested they take it to a Pokémon Aromatherapy Center where it recovered after it was sprayed with some medicine.

character.name: Fushigidane (Haruka)
character.description: May met a clumsy Bulbasaur in the Forbidden Forest trying to pick flowers.

character.name: Wakasyamo (Haruka)
character.description: Torchic then evolved into Combusken during a battle against some Breloom.

character.name: Rossi
character.description: Ross was the previous years winner of the Alto Mare Summer Festa race. He raced with his Wailmer and was neck and neck with Ash and Misty for most of the race but ended up coming second to Misty and was unable to defend his title. He wasn`t too disappointed and he offered to give Misty and her friends a ride in his gondola. He told them about the legend of Latios and Latias and how they protected the city and then dropped them off at a crêpe shop.

character.name: Butler
character.description: Butler was a scientist and magician that used to work for Team Magma. He was fired after a failed attempt to create a Groudon from fossils. Realizing he needed more power, he wanted help from the powers of Jirachi. Butler`s intentions were more evil than his girlfriend, Diane, suspected, so she tried to prevent him from hurting Jirachi when she fled with Ash, Brock, May, Max, and Jirachi. After following them via a tracking device on Diane`s van, Butler captured Jirachi and used its power. Instead of resurrecting Groudon, it instead created an evil being that was similar to it. After begging for forgiveness, he received help to stop the fake Groudon. When the Groudon was destroyed and everyone was saved, Butler and Diane reunited and together they agreed to protect Pokémon.

character.name: Bohmander (Butler)
character.description: Butler`s Salamence was used to keep Ash and Max away from the machine that helped Butler take advantage of Jirachi`s powers.

character.name: Ryuu
character.description: Rafe is the older brother of Audrey and Kathryn. He`s a talented Pokémon trainer that competed in the Battle Tower. He`s generally calm, but can show hints of arrogance. Along with his Blaziken, he helped fend off the clones of Deoxys and help free the abducted citizens of LaRousse City. He also assisted restoring energy to the city to regenerate Deoxys` body.

character.name: Shouta
character.description: Sid is a Pokémon Trainer that competed in the Battle Tower. He became very attracted to May and consistently flirted with her, but she didn`t share the same interest in him. When the clones of Deoxys (Purple-core) were abducting people, he sacrificed himself to save May and was taken instead. After being saved by the others, he assisted in restoring energy to the city with the help of his Blastoise.

character.name: Kathryn
character.description: Katharine is a young Pokémon trainer and is Audrey`s twin sister. The both of them are the younger sisters of Rafe. She came to LaRousse City with her siblings, Sid, and Rebecca to compete at the Battle Tower. She and Audrey work exceptionally well as a team.

character.name: Audrey
character.description: Audrey is a young Pokémon trainer and is Katharine`s twin sister. The both of them are the younger sisters of Rafe. She came to LaRousse City with her siblings, Sid, and Rebecca to compete at the Battle Tower. She and Katharine work exceptionally well as a team.

character.name: Ametama (Kathryn)
character.description: Katharine`s Surskit is the only known Pokémon belonging to Katharine. It detected the presence of the clones of Deoxys (Purple-core) and notified everyone so they could evacuate their hideout.

character.name: Kamex (Shouta)
character.description: Sid`s Blastoise was used in a Tag Battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Torkoal. It battled alongside Rafe`s Blaziken.

character.name: Amemoth (Audrey)
character.description: Audrey`s Masquerain is the only known Pokémon belonging to Audrey. Along with other Flying type Pokémon, it helped turn the wind turbines so that the necessary energy to revive Deoxys (Green-core) could be produced.

character.name: Rondo-hakase
character.description: Professor Lund is a Pokémon Professor and is also Tory`s father. He intends to revive Deoxys from a fossil.

character.name: Tool
character.description: As a child, Tory Lund became heavily traumatized after a meteor caused a stampede of Walrein to frighten him. This fear of being close to Pokémon continued for years although he was secretly interested in them. He did, however, befriend an entity that was actually Deoxys. Tory Lund first met Ash accidentally when they were paired in a team battle against Rafe and Sid. As Tory Lund had no Pokémon of his own, Ash lent his Torkoal, but Tory Lund`s lack of experience caused the two to lose.

character.name: Yuuko
character.description: Yuuko works in a laboratory as Professor Lund`s assistant where she helps his attempt of reviving Deoxys. While she shares no family relationship to Tory, she serves as somewhat of a mother figure to him.

character.name: Hitomi
character.description: Rebecca is a Pokémon trained that intended to compete in the Battle Tower, but Ash accidentally cut in front of her in the lineup. She befriended Brock, May, and Max in the audience when she began complaining over Ash`s interference. An intelligent and easily fascinated girl, Rebecca became interested in the entity of Deoxys that Tory Lund introduced them to. Rebecca concluded that the entity and Deoxys had the same energy patterns. She assisted in restoring energy to LaRousse City.

character.name: Metagross (Hitomi)
character.description: Rebecca`s Metagross is a powerful Pokémon. It used its Reflect attack to stop the Deoxys clones and its Psychic attack to move a wind turbine in order to produce a part of the energy needed to revive Deoxys.

character.name: Bursyamo (Ryuu)
character.description: Rafe`s Blaziken was used in a Tag Battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Torkoal. It battled alongside Sid`s Blastoise.
